title: Revolted Masses - Us or Them (greek thrash-death metal) (2013)
description:
Revolted Masses were formed in 2008 in Athens, Greece. Their music approaches the area of extreme metal, with influences from the general rock/metal area and a touch of oriental elements. The lyrics are mainly of a radical political nature. Their first, self-titled demo, was released in 2009 and their second demo-EP "Seeds of Revolt" followed in 2010. Also, two of the bands songs have participated in Ã¢â‚¬Å“Manifesto: Self Released Metal CompilationÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Vol. 1 & 2. Finally, the band has performed in various live venues both in Athens and Thessaloniki. 

This release is their first full-length album, and consists of 11 tracks. The production is made by the band, and it is a self-released album. 

Revolted Masses are: 

George Triantafyllidis: vocals 
Vaggelis Theodorakis: guitars 
Kostas Karvounis-Zoumpos: guitars 
George Stathopoulos: bass guitar 
George Anamouroglou: drums 

Music and lyrics by Revolted Masses 
Produced, mixed and mastered by Revolted Masses in 2012-13 
Artwork, layout and photo editing by Remedy Art design
